name: gist.create_private
description: Create a secret GitHub Gist from files or inline content.

files.description: File paths to include in the gist. Mutually exclusive with content.

content.description: Inline text content for the gist. Used when files is null or empty.

filename.description: Filename to use for inline content mode. Only valid when using content.

errors.description: Invalid input (e.g. filename with files, or no content).
gh gist create failed (auth, API error, etc.).

side_effects: Creates a new secret gist under the authenticated gh user.
version_notes: v1 migrated from create-private-gist Codex skill.
